title: Guinsoos rageblade bug? (Riot pls notiz)
body:
I don't know if it is intentional or not, but in one of my games as Yi, i was using Guinsoos rageblade{{item:3124}} along with Wits End {{item:3091}} as well as black cleaver {{item:3071}}. And once i gained full stacks of Guinsoos, my attacks would apply the {{item:3091}} and {{item:3071}} DEBUFF on my own champion, REDUCING my own Armor and Magic resist. After selling Rageblade, it didn't happen any more.  
Is this a bug or is this intentional? I am using the New Client.
Please help.
